--- In gladiator@y..., "m_yohalem2002" <zqca@d...> wrote:
> Okay, I figured out how to modify text, but I have a few questions:
> 
> 1) Is there any quick way to clear the entire description?

Yes, you can clear the entire population really quickly. 
Unfortunately, that also clears everything but the background.  Press 
Control D to do that.
 
> 2) I heard mention of levels where NPCs couldn't die -- that is, you 
> cannot let team 0 people die and still win.  How exactly does this 
> work?

Press "*" while editing the scenario with built-in scenario editor.  
You'll have a couple of other options to choose from.

Honestly, I would rather people work on the "50 Project" than start 
on a brand new set on their own.  I almost have the entire storyline 
ready (I plan on finishing within an hour.).
